venue.name: sampson park at sharon dog park

item.description:
Hello all!
For those of us that have dogs that may need a slower introduction to new pals, a leashed pack walk might be something to try(?) I have two very sweet, funny rescues (since Aug/Jan - both young dogs) that are very bonded to each other, do well with other dogs. But, sometimes the "frenzy" of so many unleashed new dogs (at meet-ups) can visibly frustrate/ stress them.
Wondering if anyone is interested in a slower introduction by going for a leashed pack walk? (that could happen on a perhaps on a monthly/whatever basis if people are interested?)
Willing to travel.............if this doesn't fly with the group - feel free to contact me directly if interested. I live in Hanover, MA and have some great locations for this. Thanks! Jennie
item.name: Leashed pack walks?
